sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_dropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic single select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_fileUploadField

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic multi select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValues: joinarray(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!value,
    expression: displayvalue(fv!item, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null)
  ), ", "),
  local!i18nData:rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleNames: "AS.CO.CommonObjects"
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValues,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              i18nData: local!i18nData,
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      required: ri!required,
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_pickerFieldCustom
sub_interfaces.description: Generic custom Picker field to handle read-only logic dynamically.

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pickerFieldCustom"(
  label: ri!label,
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  readOnly: ri!readOnly,
  required: ri!required,
  disabled: ri!disabled,
  maxSelections: ri!maxSelections,
  suggestFunction: ri!suggestFunction,
  selectedLabels: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!value),
    {},
    ri!selectedLabels
  ),
  selectedTooltips: ri!selectedTooltips,
  value: ri!value,
  validations: ri!validations,
  saveInto: ri!saveInto,
  validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
  /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
  requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
    label: ri!label,
    requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
  ),
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: ri!readOnly
  ),
  placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(placeholder: ri!placeholder),
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  selectedLinks: ri!selectedLinks,
  showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_evalDocsStartAuditProcess_Parameters
expression_rules.description: Populates the parameters for start audit of AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument audit

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!externalAction: if(
    ri!isDeleteDocument,
    cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
    cons!AS_GAM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UPLOAD
  ),
  rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
    newObjects: ri!evaluationDocuments,
    originalObjects: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
    objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument',
    objectDse: if(
      ri!writeObject = false,
      null,
      cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_DOCUMENT
    ),
    auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_A_R_EVALUATION,
    auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Evaluation(),
    username: ri!initiator,
    auditType: cons!AS_GAM_ADT_TXT_AUDIT_TYPE_MANIPULATION,
    externalAction: local!externalAction,
    complexFieldName: "documentChanges",
    manipulationAudit: rule!AS_GSS_BL_constructFieldChangesForEvalDocs(
      evaluationDocuments: ri!evaluationDocuments,
      factorDocMapping: ri!factorDocMapping,
      externalAction: local!externalAction,
      originalEvalDocs: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
      originalFactorDocMapping: ri!originalFactorDocMapping
    )
  ).auditParams
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(

  ),
  rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
    newObjects: ri!evaluationDocuments,
    originalObjects: ri!originalEvalDocuments,
    objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument',
    objectDse: if(
      ri!writeObject = false,

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)
data.definition:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),

      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),

    }
  )[1],

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getFactorDocumentMapping
expression_rules.description: returns factor document mappings

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_FACTOR_DOCUMENT_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping',
  returnType: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_AGGREGATION,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,

  ),
  executeWhen: or(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaIds)
  ),
  aggregation: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregation"(
      aggregationcolumns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "document.evalDocumentId",
          isgrouping: true,
          alias: "evalDocumentId"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "factor.criteriaId",
          aggregationfunction: "COUNT",
          alias: "factors"
        ),

      }
    ),
    {}
  ),
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "document.evalDocumentId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!documentIds,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factor.criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaIds,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,

    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_FACTOR_DOCUMENT_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping',
  returnType: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_AGGREGATION,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    
  ),
  executeWhen: or(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaIds)
  ),
  aggregation: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregation"(
      aggregationcolumns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "document.evalDocumentId",
          isgrouping: true,
          alias: "evalDocumentId"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "factor.criteriaId",
          aggregationfunction: "COUNT",
          alias: "factors"
        ),
        
      }
    ),
    {}
  ),
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "document.evalDocumentId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!documentIds,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds)

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factor.criteriaId",
      operator: "in",

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
expression_rules.description: Concatenates a list into a sentence with a configurable final separator, and/or

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
